securityMessage: We prioritize the security of your API key and handle it with utmost care. Your key is exclusively stored on your browser and never shared with any third-party entity. It is solely used for the intended purpose of accessing the OpenAI API and not for any other unauthorized use.

apiBaseUrl.description: Set the Base URL of the OpenAI-compatible API (e.g. https://api.openai.com/v1). When you use a third-party Base URL, it functions as a proxy, enabling you to access the API in regions where it might otherwise be restricted.
apiBaseUrl.warn: If you provide a custom Base URL that grants free access to the OpenAI API, you can use ChatGPT without supplying an API key by simply leaving the API key field blank. However, be cautious when using third-party endpoints, as untrustworthy ones may log your personal information. Always verify the reliability of a Base URL before using it.

noApiKeyWarning: No API key supplied! Please check your API settings.
